biotools.summary: ArrayAnalysis is a web-based application for transcriptomic data analysis. It supports the analysis of both microarray and RNA-seq data. The tool may also be installed locally as a desktop app, Docker image, or R package.

bioschemas.name: ArrayAnalysis
